title: Study on the structure–activity relationship of cationic polyacrylates for the treatment of oilfield produced water
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8124-8134
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00188E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhiping Chen, Xiujun Wang, Jian Zhang, Wenju Zhang, Ming Duan, Yan Xiong, Shenwen Fang
Cationic polyacrylates exhibit both reverse demulsification and flotation performance, which can avoid incompatibility between the reverse demulsifier and flotation agent during treatment of produced water from offshore oilfields.
